00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 namespace cxx {
00023 
00030 class Bitmap_base
00031 {
00032 private:
00033   enum
00034   {
00035     W_bits = sizeof(unsigned long) * 8,
00036     C_bits = 8,
00037   };
00038   unsigned long *_bits;
00039 
00040 public:
00041   explicit Bitmap_base(void *bits) throw() : _bits((unsigned long *)bits) {}
00042 
00044   static long words(long bits) throw() { return (bits + W_bits -1) / W_bits; }
00045   static long bit_buffer_bytes(long bits) throw()
00046   { return words(bits) * W_bits / 8; }
00047 
00049   template< long BITS >
00050   class Word
00051   {
00052   public:
00053     typedef unsigned long Type;
00054     enum
00055     {
00056       Size = (BITS + W_bits - 1) / W_bits
00057     };
00058   };
00059 
00061   static long chars(long bits) throw ()
00062   { return (bits + C_bits -1) / C_bits; }
00063 
00065   template< long BITS >
00066   class Char
00067   {
00068   public:
00069     typedef unsigned char Type;
00070     enum
00071     {
00072       Size = (BITS + C_bits - 1) / C_bits
00073     };
00074   };
00075 
00081   void bit(long bit, bool on) throw();
00082 
00087   void clear_bit(long bit) throw();
00092   void set_bit(long bit) throw();
00093 
00098   unsigned long operator [] (long bit) const throw();
00099 
00105   long scan_zero(long max_bit, long start_bit = 0) const throw();
00106 
00107   void *bit_buffer() const throw() { return _bits; }
00108 
00109 protected:
00110   static int _bzl(unsigned long w) throw();
00111 };
00112 
00113 
00119 template<int BITS>
00120 class Bitmap : public Bitmap_base
00121 {
00122 private:
00123   char _bits[Bitmap_base::Char<BITS>::Size];
00124 
00125 public:
00127   Bitmap() throw() : Bitmap_base(_bits) {}
00128   Bitmap(Bitmap<BITS> const &o) throw() : Bitmap_base(_bits)
00129   { __builtin_memcpy(_bits, o._bits, sizeof(_bits)); }
00137   void clear_all()
00138   { __builtin_memset(_bits, 0, sizeof(_bits)); } 
00139 
00140   long scan_zero(long start_bit = 0) const throw();
00141 };
00142 
00143 
00144 inline
00145 void
00146 Bitmap_base::bit(long bit, bool on) throw()
00147 {
00148   long idx = bit / W_bits;
00149   long b   = bit % W_bits;
00150   _bits[idx] = (_bits[idx] & ~(1UL << b)) | ((unsigned long)on << b);
00151 }
00152 
00153 inline
00154 void
00155 Bitmap_base::clear_bit(long bit) throw()
00156 {
00157   long idx = bit / W_bits;
00158   long b   = bit % W_bits;
00159   _bits[idx] &= ~(1UL << b);
00160 }
00161 
00162 inline
00163 void
00164 Bitmap_base::set_bit(long bit) throw()
00165 {
00166   long idx = bit / W_bits;
00167   long b   = bit % W_bits;
00168   _bits[idx] |= (1UL << b);
00169 }
00170 
00171 inline
00172 unsigned long
00173 Bitmap_base::operator [] (long bit) const throw()
00174 {
00175   long idx = bit / W_bits;
00176   long b   = bit % W_bits;
00177   return _bits[idx] & (1UL << b);
00178 }
00179 
00180 inline
00181 int
00182 Bitmap_base::_bzl(unsigned long w) throw()
00183 {
00184   for (int i = 0; i < W_bits; ++i, w >>= 1)
00185     {
00186       if ((w & 1) == 0)
00187   return i;
00188     }
00189   return -1;
00190 }
00191 
00192 inline
00193 long
00194 Bitmap_base::scan_zero(long max_bit, long start_bit) const throw()
00195 {
00196   if (!(operator [] (start_bit)))
00197     return start_bit;
00198 
00199   long idx = start_bit / W_bits;
00200 
00201   max_bit -= start_bit & ~(W_bits - 1);
00202 
00203   for (; max_bit > 0; max_bit -= W_bits, ++idx)
00204     {
00205       if (_bits[idx] == 0)
00206   return idx * W_bits;
00207 
00208       if (_bits[idx] != ~0UL)
00209   return idx * W_bits + _bzl(_bits[idx]);
00210     }
00211 
00212   return -1;
00213 }
00214 
00215 template<int BITS> inline
00216 long
00217 Bitmap<BITS>::scan_zero(long start_bit) const throw()
00218 {
00219   return Bitmap_base::scan_zero(BITS, start_bit);
00220 }
00221 
00222 };
